item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Friday, March 21, 2025 at 8:15 PM UTC
item.description:

2. Show HN: A terminal emulator in pure PHP (62 points | 36 comments)
3. Chunking Attacks on File Backup Services Using Content-Deﬁned Chunking [pdf] (46 points | 13 comments)

29. Numbering should start at zero (1982) (84 points | 215 comments)
